content: If you enable these guests, they will be able to log in to {{productName}} again.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a setting that allows guests to log back into the application. The description will appear in a UI element, such as a dialog or settings menu, and helps users understand the implications of this setting on their account security.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'məhsuluna' is a less precise translation of 'product' in this context. It implies a tangible product, whereas {{productName}} is likely a service or platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'platforma' or a more general term like 'sistemə' depending on the precise nature of {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian sentence 'Se abiliti questi ospiti potranno accedere di nuovo a {{productName}}' uses the informal 'abiliti' (you enable). It might be more appropriate to use the formal 'abilita' (you enable) depending on the target audience and the overall tone of the application. Consider the context to determine the correct form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se abilita questi ospiti potranno accedere di nuovo a {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "log in" is inaccurate. "Conecta" implies connecting to a network, not logging into a system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă activați invitații, aceștia vor putea să se autentifice din nou la {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'подключите' (podklyuchite) translates to 'connect' or 'plug in', which doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'enable' in this context. 'Включите' (vkluchite) would be a more accurate translation for 'enable'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Если вы включите этих гостей, они снова смогут войти в {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on üzerinde tekrar oturum açabileceklerdir' is a slightly awkward phrasing in Turkish. A more natural and fluent way to say 'log in again' would be 'tekrar giriş yapabileceklerdir'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu konukları etkinleştirirseniz, {{productName}} üzerinde tekrar giriş yapabileceklerdir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '此访客' (this guest) is not accurate. It implies a single guest, while the English suggests multiple guests.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 如果您启用这些访客 (Rúguǒ nín qǐyòng zhèxiē fǎngkè) - 'If you enable these guests'
